name: D3play
body:
D3play
======

Nothing very useful here. Just playing with JavaScript and D3.

Hopefully there will be beautiful/funny results.

Have a look!
------------

### Dragon curve
![Dragon curve screenshot](https://github.com/Qeole/D3play/blob/master/previews/dragon.png)
A Dragon curve generated dynamically. [Go to page](dragon.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
